wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General William Millar (died 1838), was a British Royal Artillery officer during the French Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars; and later he was Colonel Commandant Royal Artillery.

response: * William Millar (APTA), former President of the American Public Transportation Association
* William Millar (British Army officer) (died 1838), British Royal Artillery officer
* William Millar (1931–1977), Irish-born American actor, known as Stephen Boyd
